title: ayuskabob
author: ayuskabob
created_time: August 06, 2022, 03:24:24 PMLast edit: August 07, 2022, 01:18:17 PM by ayuskabob

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: ayuskabob on August 06, 2022, 03:24:24 PMNeed 2 freelancers to perform online tasks.data entry jobs and other simple tasks for 3 days,payment in eth or btc (mainly eth),telegram = @jjoneliesThis board is specific to Bitcoin. If it is "mainly ETH", then you can advertise in the Altcoins section. In particular, Marketplace (Altcoins) or Bounties (Altcoins) are boards where you can advertise services with altcoin payments.Also, it would also be helpful if you could give us a little more information about the job as well as a feel for the pay level.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: ayuskabob on August 06, 2022, 03:24:24 PMNeed 2 freelancers to perform online tasks.data entry jobs and other simple tasks for 3 days,payment in eth or btc (mainly eth),telegram = @jjoneliesCan you tell how much will you pay for this three days task ?Also, will you pay in advance or after the task is completed. I recommend using escrow if you decide to give payment after the task so both parties are save and there is no chance of scam.

comments.author: Frostbase
comments.body: Quote from: ayuskabob on August 06, 2022, 03:24:24 PMNeed 2 freelancers to perform online tasks.data entry jobs and other simple tasks for 3 days,payment in eth or btc (mainly eth),telegram = @jjoneliesSent you a message on telegram
